column1: "Certo, ascolta attentamente i tuoi sintomi e segnalagni. Un'affanno after a short walk could be related to several factors, including stress, anxiety, or a possible cardiovascular event. I recommend you to consult with your doctor as soon as possible for proper evaluation and treatment. In the meantime, try to remain calm and avoid any strenuous activities that may exacerbate your symptoms." "Potrebbe essere utile parlarne con un medico per un'adeguata valutazione."
